body.name: A Detective's Bloody Pursuit: A Historical Western Adventure Novel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ACTION PACKED SEMI-ROMANCE
reviews.reviewText: Setting Redwood Ridge, California 1892. I was captivated with the first chapter to the last. West is changing Marlowe “Mele” an ex-Pinkerton and his friend, Frank an ex-sheriff startup a private detective agency. Mele is waiting for the train to come in with his fiancée as passenger. Something happened on the train with engineer shot and two passengers kidnapped. Mele’s Amanda was not on the train and he received a Dear John letter. A lot of humor simulated with Mele’s choice of suit to go to train and his heading to saloon after reading that letter. “When things don’t go your way, don’t try to drown your sorrows in drink” is wise statement by Mele.The wife and mother of the two kidnapped victims hired Mele’s detective agency to investigate and find them. Cassidy is the daughter sent along on this investigation. A semi-romance connection is formed between Cassidy and Mele. Intrigue, kidnapping. Robbery, corrupt lawyer, greedy rancher with hired henchmen to get what he wants included in this page turning story to keep a reader glued.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Interesting Western about the 1890’s.
reviews.reviewText: The western is written about the 1890’s, which is in between time for the old west and the start of the no west. People’s attitudes changed from carry guns to no carry guns, no cowboys and no Indians. This book could have been written in any time period and worked. Merl and Frank worked good together and were natural’s get along with people. Cass was an unnatural part that worked out in the story as it went along. She belong in the 1850’s. She and Merl didn’t have a common thread to connect them into the semi-romantic part of the book. The author does good setting the characters attitudes and personalities up so to have the right mix to make the book work. Read and enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is another great story by Derek Levine. He keeps you involved in his tales from the first page until you finish the last. This story is about an ex-Pinkerton agent and his friend anex-sheriff that open a detective agency in the same western town. They get involved in the biggest case that hits their area and pits the good guys against the bad guys until the very end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An amazing story
reviews.reviewText: This was another great story that takes place in the old west with an engaging storyline and characters. They will pull you into this adventure. I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed reading this novel it is got a great storyline I very much enjoyed reading this book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed the book until i get to the end and find out the link to the extended epilogue didn’t work on my iPad. Finally after about 10 min it did and i was highly disappointed in the extended epilogue which basically told us how well they were able to work together. It was not worth my time and effort. If it is part of the story put it in the story! Any other time this would have been given a much higher rating. Another name on my list of ‘authors to avoid’

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "A Detective's Bloody Pursuit".
reviews.reviewText: Another great book by a great author. Connected with the characters and had a hard time putting the book down until I finished it. Thank you so much for all your books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marl, Frank and Cassidy will definitely keep you turning pages through their exploits!
reviews.reviewText: Another five stars sensation by one of my many favorite authors, as Mr. Levine keys another outstanding Western adventure! No slowdowns throughout this compelling series of unending excitement!Some of the most endearing, and definitely entertaining, storylines I have read! And I have read a few! No slowdowns throughout this compelling series of unending, realistically motivated adventures! Grabs your attention immediately and the excitement only intensifys with each new endeavor! Too, the character selections are unsurpassed in their respective assignments from beginning to end!Most definitely recommend this compassionately motivated series of unending excitement to all readers, regardless of your normal reading adventures! I assure you to be riding along with the good guys, and gal, as they go above and beyond in their efforts to bring justice to those responsible for their misdeeds! No slowdowns in this one, I assure you!!!😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 9, 2023
